<title level="1" right="Rules">[AC Bonus](/Rules.aspx?ID=2182)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 274 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
A shield grants a circumstance bonus to AC, but only when the shield is raised. This requires using the [Raise a Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=98) action.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
